mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(review_id, nickname, review_addr, content, review_photo, review_date, star, is_allowed) VALUES (seq_review_review_id.NEXTVAL, #{nickName}, #{reviewPlace}, #{reviewContents:VARCHAR}, #{reviewPhoto:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{star:VARCHAR}, #{isAllowed:VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT review_id, nickname, review_addr, content, review_photo, review_date, star, is_allowed FROM review WHERE review_id = #{value}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (SELECT tran_no, buyer_id, user_name, cell_phone, tran_status_code FROM transaction, users WHERE user_id = buyer_id AND buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM(SELECT p.prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date, tran_no, tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no = t.prod_no
AND p.prod_no LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND LOWER(p.prod_name) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY tran_no DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT p.prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date, tran_no, tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no = t.prod_no
AND p.prod_no LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND LOWER(p.prod_name) LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
